Desc.entry: Amateur boxing club catering for all levels of ability. Males and females welcome from the age of 7 years and over. Currently has a squad of around 16 boxers regularly in competition. All welcome.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon, Wed & Fri 4.45-6pm (aged 11-16 years), 6-8pm (16 years and over ), Tues 4.45-5.45 (7-11 years), Sat 10-11am (7-11 years), 11am-12noon (16 years and over)
